Notes:
This is a special Encode which took me a whole week of work, but the result is excellent, its a masterpiece from this source
I have encoded it in 1080p only cause this movie needs quality. daylight scenes are perfect and night scenes are now too
Quality is tested and optimized to look perfect even on a 75" 4K TV

Encode:
The Chinese telecine needed a lot of work, brightness,constrast,colours,saturation,black base,white base
and that all changed from scene to scene differently, so i had no other choice than to split the movie in scenes, and do each one as needed
ended up with 120 files and 1tb of data, and manually corrected them each
it was a pita, but totally worth it. nothing is cut from the movie btw

Line Audio was great, lipsynced to my video

got very nice and will do me till retail
enjoy
